## Introduction

```{r}
#############################
library(algebraic.mle)
library(md.tools)
library(dplyr)
library(tibble)
library(stats)

###########################
mle_solver <- function(data, ind) {
    start <- sim_anneal(par = theta, fn = ll,
        control = list(fnscale = -1, maxit = 10000L, trace = FALSE,
                        t_init = 50, .001, alpha = 0.9,
                        it_per_temp = 20L, sup = function(x) all(x > 0)))

    theta.boot <- md_mle_exp_series_C1_C2_C3(
        md = data[ind],
        theta0 = start$par)
}
```
